Description: The type of transaction. (Such as a payment or a refund)
The unique transaction ID assigned by PhonePe for this transaction.
For refunds; the reference ID of the original payment transaction; otherwise; this is blank.
For refunds; the merchant’s transaction ID of the original payment; otherwise; this is blank.
The merchant’s order ID for this transaction
The sender’s name; usually “PhonePe Private Limited”.
The unique ID of the store where the transaction happened.
The name of the store (or store ID if name is missing)
The unique ID of the terminal (device) used for the transaction.
The name of the terminal (or terminal ID if name is missing)
Blank column; possibly reserved for future use or customization.
The name of the customer who made the payment or received the refund.
Blank column; possibly reserved for customer comments or notes.
The name of the bank or company that issued the credit/debit card used in the transaction.
The ID of the bank associated with the card used in the transaction.
The type of card used (e.g.; CREDIT_CARD / DEBIT_CARD / RUPAY_CREDIT_CARD).
The country of the card's issuing bank (always set to "INDIA" here).
The masked Virtual Payment Address (VPA) used for the transaction.
The total sale amount for the transaction.
The amount paid using UPI (Unified Payments Interface) or external VPA.
The amount paid using an external wallet (not UPI or card).
Integrated Goods and Services Tax applied to the transaction.
State Goods and Services Tax applied to the transaction.
Central Goods and Services Tax applied to the transaction.
The total GST (sum of IGST; SGST; and CGST).
The net amount after deducting GST from the total amount.
For refunds; the date of the original payment transaction; otherwise blank.
The date when the transaction was settled (in IST; formatted as dd-MM-yyyy).
The payment instrument used (e.g.; CC; DC; EGV; RCC; UPI; Wallet).
The Unique Transaction Reference (UTR) number for the payment or refund.
The UTR number for the settlement of the transaction.
The name of the partner; always set as "PhonePe".
The unique ID of the loan associated with the transaction.
The unique ID of the loan request or application.
The Unique Transaction Reference (UTR) number for this transaction.
The date when the transaction took place (formatted as dd-MM-yyyy).
The payment source for the transaction
The purpose of the transaction
A unique reference number for this payment transaction.
A unique ID for the transaction; assigned by the external payment system.
For refunds; the external transaction ID of the original payment; otherwise blank.
For refunds; the transaction ID of the original payment; otherwise blank.
The Unique Transaction Reference (UTR) number for the payment or refund.
The date when the transaction was created (in dd-MM-yyyy format).
The Unique Transaction Reference (UTR) number for the settlement.
The total transaction amount.
The date when the transaction actually happened (in day-month-year format).
The fee charged for processing the transaction.
The unique ID of the store where the transaction happened.
The unique ID of the terminal (device) used for the transaction.
The type of ticket issued in the transaction (if applicable); otherwise blank.
A serial number for each row in the report; starting from 1.
A unique ID for the order or transaction; used to track the purchase or refund.
The ID of the buyer's app; always set as "PhonePe".
The ID of the seller; always set as "KMRL".
The date when the transaction happened; shown in day-month-year format.
The time when the transaction happened; shown in hours; minutes; and seconds.
The mobile number of the person who made the transaction.
The starting station or location for the ticket or journey.
The ending station or location for the ticket or journey.
The number of tickets purchased in the transaction.
A unique ID for the ticket issued in the transaction.
The current status of the ticket (e.g.; active; cancelled).
The bank reference number (UTR) for the payment or refund.
The total amount paid for the transaction.
(Blank column; reserved for future use or extra fees).
Indicates if the transaction is a payment or a refund.
The amount settled after deducting fees and taxes from the total amount.
(Blank column; reserved for future use or bank details).
(Blank column; reserved for future use or bank details).
The reference number for the settlement transaction.
The date when the settlement UTR was created.
(Blank column; reserved for future use or adjustments).
